General.Name: Logah Technology Corp
General.Description: Logah Technology Corp. engages in the manufacture of automatic pinning, molding, cold, hot gloss, plating and assembly products. It provides plastic body parts of conference display, 3C products, displays, mobile phone, and household products; curved displays; headphone, charger, power bank, and electroacoustic plastic shell products; two-material injection molding, smart speakers, tablets, and vacuum cleaner products; and automotive interior, energy, and outdoor products. Logah Technology Corp. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Liang  Xinjin
1.Title: Sr. Mang. of Accounting & Admin. Office
